name: Nur
about: the PI of the lab, carries scientific curiosity, friend of a cat (Yoda)

name: Alireza
about: is a graduate student in the Mechatronics department. He has a background in Mechanical Engineering and Computational Fluid Dynamics

name: Nilufer
about: received her bachelor's degree in Bioengineering from Istanbul Technical University in 2015. She completed her Master's studies in Bioengineering from Marmara University in 2019 and joined Sabanci University as a Ph.D. candidate in the BIO program

name: Eda
about: Genetics and Bioengineering graduate of Istanbul Bilgi University. Pursuing Master's in Molecular Biology, Genetics and Bioengineering program at Sabancı University

name: Ceren
about: Next Position: Clinical Trial Assistant & Application Specialist at Pfizer

name: Gulin
about: is graduate student in BIO program at Sabancı University, having a bachelors degree from Yeditepe University and master degree from Acibadem University. She is interested in understanding of neurodegenerative and neuropsychiatric diseases by creating disease models, and using pharmacogenomic approches to find novel treatment methods. She is crazy about theater and movies.

name: Yomna
about: is a graduate student aims to understand the brain and its disease forms in order to offer novel therapeutic solutions for them. She has worked as a TA in Biochemistry at Mansoura University, Egypt since 2018. She has previously worked as a Pharmacist after graduation. She has graduated from the Faculty of Pharmacy, Mansoura University, Egypt with a BSc in Pharmaceutical Sciences in 2017

name: Efe
about: is a senior Molecular Biology, Genetics and Bioengineering undergrad from Sabanci University. He loves science, philosophy and his bass guitar.

name: Melis
about: Senior Molecular Biology, Genetics and Bioengineering undergrad from Sabanci University. Always excited to learn new things and is very passionate about art history.

name: Fereshteh
about: Next Position: PhD Student at Tarbiat Modares University

name: Nafisa
about: Nafisa is a PhD student in the BIO program at Sabancı University. She completed her bachelor’s degree in Pharmacy and master’s degree in Clinical Pharmacy and Molecular Pharmacology from East West University, Dhaka, Bangladesh.
